title: Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: resist block printed on plain weave; immersion dyed in  indigo
inscribed: "SAUNIER TINTURIER INDIENEUR A MACON" in a frame, resist printed on the back.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 65.5 x 36 cm (25 13/16 x 14 3/16 in.)
Repeat H: 229.5 cm (7 ft. 6 3/8 in.)
description: 'S' curving ribbon alternate with floral sprays on left. At right a stripe of vases of flowers on a table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: linen
Technique: resist block printed on plain weave; immersion dyed in  indigo. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-13.
